Package org.apache.fop.render.afp

An AFP Renderer implementation and supporting classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AFPCustomizable Interface used to customize the AFP renderer or document handler.
AFPRendererContextConstants Defines a number of standard constants (keys) for use by the RendererContext class.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAFPImageHandlerRawStream A base abstract AFP raw stream image handler
AFPDocumentHandler IFDocumentHandler implementation that produces AFP (MO:DCA).
AFPDocumentHandlerMaker Intermediate format document handler factory for AFP output.
AFPForeignAttributeReader Parses any AFP foreign attributes
AFPGraphics2DAdapter Graphics2DAdapter implementation for AFP.
AFPImageHandler A base abstract AFP image handler
AFPImageHandlerGraphics2D PDFImageHandler implementation which handles Graphics2D images.
AFPImageHandlerRawCCITTFax AFPImageHandler implementation which handles CCITT encoded images (CCITT fax group 3/4).
AFPImageHandlerRawJPEG ImageHandler implementation which handles ImageRawJPEG instances.
AFPImageHandlerRawStream AFPImageHandler implementation which handles raw stream images.
AFPImageHandlerRenderedImage PDFImageHandler implementation which handles RenderedImage instances.
AFPImageHandlerSVG Image handler implementation which handles SVG images for AFP output.
AFPInfo AFP information structure for drawing the XML document.
AFPPainter IFPainter implementation that produces AFP (MO:DCA).
AFPRendererConfigurator AFP Renderer configurator
AFPRendererContext AFP-specific renderer context class.
AFPRendererImageInfo The AFP image information
AFPRenderingContext Rendering context for AFP (MO:DCA) production.
AFPShadingMode Enumeration class for the AFP shading mode.
AFPSVGHandler AFP XML handler for SVG.
 

Package org.apache.fop.render.afp Description

An AFP Renderer implementation and supporting classes.
